gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Spurs 117, Pacers 105
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Victor Wembanyama’s 31 points, 12 rebounds, six assists and six blocks, the Spurs defeated the Pacers, 117-105. Malaki Branham (18 points, six assists) and Keldon Johnson (17 points) added a combined 35 points for the Spurs in the victory, while T.J. McConnell tallied a season-high 26 points, along with five assists for the Pacers in the losing effort. The Spurs have won back-to-back games as they improve to 13-48 on the season, while the Pacers fall to 34-28.
